alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Seminole, east central Lake, northwestern Orange and south central Volusia Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cassia to near Lake Mary to near DeBary. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Deltona, Sanford, Apopka and Altamonte Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole
